title: About Navigapi
summary: Most pentesters don’t know a bill of lading from a rate confirmation. We do.
details: Navigapi was built by someone who’s lived the logistics grind — booking loads, managing LTL exceptions, and integrating carriers through Project44. That firsthand experience means we understand how TMS, WMS, and carrier APIs actually work — and where they’re vulnerable.
mission: We don’t just test endpoints. We secure the workflows that move freight — uncovering BOLA, BFLA, and business-logic flaws before attackers can exploit them.
value: Navigapi bridges the gap between logistics operations and modern API security, helping carriers, shippers, and tech platforms protect the systems that keep supply chains running.
